name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vidmate for PC - Windows and Mac

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Extension provide Vidmate Features and Updates Status.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VidMate is one of the most used applications worldwide in both Windows and Mac computers.This app popular is user-friendly interface and Simple Interface.

This particular extension created for share the latest updates and features of Vidmate app. Install it to get new version alert. 

Vidmate Application helps to Watching music and movies offline on the big screen. After downloading VidMate, you will be able to select the media you want to watch late in offline mode.

This application uses different languages. Some of these languages include Hindi, Tamil, Marathi, and many others languages.

This app supports different formats of videos which include 3GP, MOV, Mp4, and FLV. This makes sure you choose the media format that plays well on your PC.

Thanks for using this extension.
